body_html:
Hello,

I took latest code from github and still I am getting this error,

Preparing WMT data in /tmp
Creating 3 layers of 1024 units.
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "translate.py", line 290, in
tf.app.run()
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/platform/app.py", line 30, in run
sys.exit(main(sys.argv))
File "translate.py", line 287, in main
train()
File "translate.py", line 152, in train
model = create_model(sess, False)
File "translate.py", line 131, in create_model
dtype=dtype)
TypeError: init() got an unexpected keyword argument 'dtype'

As per your previous comments, I cross check my seq2seq_model.py and translate.py, both files are latest and have required changes to avoid this error.

Still I am facing this issue, can you look into this issue and re-open it?

FYI,
My tensorflow revision is 0.10, I am using python-2.7.
What is the latest release revision of tensorflow? I will try updating tensorflow to latest revision and can check again.

body:
Hello,

I took latest code from github and still I am getting this error,

Preparing WMT data in /tmp
Creating 3 layers of 1024 units.
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "translate.py", line 290, in <module>
    tf.app.run()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/platform/app.py", line 30, in run
    sys.exit(main(sys.argv))
  File "translate.py", line 287, in main
    train()
  File "translate.py", line 152, in train
    model = create_model(sess, False)
  File "translate.py", line 131, in create_model
    dtype=dtype)
TypeError: **init**() got an unexpected keyword argument 'dtype'

As per your previous comments, I cross check my seq2seq_model.py and translate.py, both files are latest and have required changes to avoid this error.

Still I am facing this issue, can you look into this issue and re-open it?

FYI,
My tensorflow revision is 0.10, I am using python-2.7.
What is the latest release revision of tensorflow? I will try updating tensorflow to latest revision and can check again.
